### [Safe Memory Access](/documentation/Swift/MutableRawSpan#Safe-Memory-Access)

[`struct Span`](/documentation/swift/span)`Span<Element>` represents a contiguous region of memory which contains initialized instances of `Element`.[`struct RawSpan`](/documentation/swift/rawspan)`RawSpan` represents a contiguous region of memory which contains initialized bytes.[`struct OutputSpan`](/documentation/swift/outputspan)[`struct UTF8Span`](/documentation/swift/utf8span)A borrowed view into contiguous memory that contains validly-encoded UTF-8 code units.[`struct MutableSpan`](/documentation/swift/mutablespan)
